readable.title: 2087640654_1a84577a44
readable.content: A blonde dog is digging a deep hole in the ground and its tail is up in the air . A dog half way in a hole in the ground . A dog is digging a large hole in a yard to find something . A dog is digging in the ground and half of his body is under the ground . The rear end of an animal whose front end is underground .
